column1: Kata Robata////Came here for an anniversary dinner. Decided to show up without a reservation and got pretty lucky. Albeit a bit pricey
column2: the food was delicious! We had their appetizers
column4: and dessert and everything tasted pretty good. We wanted to try the Ramen because we heard good things
column5: but we didn't get to try it. Maybe next time. The sushi was fresh and well presented. We didn't get any drinks
column6: since we opted for more food.
